content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler (position -13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5)
- Small electric poles (positions -19.5, 22.5 and -15.5, 19.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups connecting the electricity generator and offshore pump:
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=33738, position -18.5, 16.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=33741, position -12.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=33742, position -8.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=33744, position -10.5, 22.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=33745, position -7.5, 23.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing small electric poles
- Ensure you are placing the small electric pole in a valid position that is not obstructed by other entities.

### Errors when inspecting inventory
- Correct the usage of the `inspect_inventory` function to only provide the necessary arguments. Ensure the first argument is an Entity or Position object instead of a Prototype object.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Verify that all necessary connections are established before attempting to use the lab or other entities that require power or resources.
